README.md: # semipartail Semiparametric tail estimation for heavy-tailed data. This package implements the method proposed by Fithian and Wager (2015). To install this package in R, run the following commands: ```R library(devtools) install_github("swager/semipartail") ``` Example usage: ```R library(semipartail) X = exp(rgamma(n=1000, shape=4, scale=0.45)) Z = exp(rgamma(n=1000000, shape=3, scale=0.45)) semipar.mean(main.sample=X, background.sample=Z, threshold=quantile(X, 0.8)) ``` #### References William Fithian and Stefan Wager. Semiparametric Exponential Families for Heavy-Tailed Data. Biometrika, 102(2):486-493, 2015. [arxiv]
